message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its potential value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and the benefits it will bring to you.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

Bob, I understand your desire to find a good deal.  However, my initial offer took into account the significant value this product holds for you, particularly considering it's worth $1,200,000 to you. I'm willing to move a bit to $1,050,000.  I think this is a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1,000,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
